bibl.title: Women and Law in Late Antiquity.
bibl.note: A comprehensive account of women's legal and social positions in the West from classical antiquity to the early middle ages. - Pp. 300-302: Index of documentary sources.
ARJAVA Antti, Women and Law in Late Antiquity.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1996, 8°, xii-304 pp. ISBN 0-19-815033-4. £35.
